sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Uniform Real Property Electronic Recording Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Uniform Real Property Electronic Recording Act.

sections.heading: Electronic documents certified by notary public.
sections.text: Electronic documents certified by notary public.

sections.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
sections.text: This Act modifies, limits, and supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act (15 U.S.C. Section 7001, et seq.) but does not modify, limit, or supersede Section 101(c) of that Act (15 U.S.C. Section 7001(c)) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in Section 103(b) of that Act (15 U.S.C. Section 7003(b)).

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
